scripts.tests-that-use-mocks: node custom/set-usemocks.ts -true && npx playwright test -g " using Mocks"
scripts.tests-that-use-api: node custom/set-usemocks.ts -true && npx playwright test -g " using API"
scripts.tests-that-dont-use-mocks: node custom/set-usemocks.ts -false && npx playwright test -g "^(?!.*\busing Mocks\b).+$"
